definition: Nanping, common place name/Nanping township in Nan'an district of Chongqing
south
surname Nan
a plain/ping, unit of area equal to approx. 3.3058 square meters (used in Japan and Taiwan)

sentences.english: There is still controversy over the attribute of the Baima Zang (Tibet- an) nationality.
sentences.chinese: 四川南坪縣“白馬藏族”族屬問題至今猶有爭議。

sentences.english: The president and his wife Michelle stood heads bowed on the South Lawn of the White House.
sentences.chinese: 總統夫婦走出白宮，步上南坪並垂首而立，肅穆默哀。
